Author: Waring EF; Perkowski EA; Smith NG (2023)
Paper Title: Soil nitrogen fertilization reduces relative leaf nitrogen allocation to photosynthesis
Photosynthesis Marker: Vcmax, Jmax (biochemical rates); Asat/An via A–Ci; chlorophyll
N addition amount: Soil N fertilization (levels reported in paper; multiple doses)
BIOMASS / Whole plant: Total leaf area and biomass reported

Author: Liu N; Wu S; Guo Q; Wang J; Cao C; Wang J (2018)
Paper Title: Leaf nitrogen assimilation and partitioning differ among subtropical forest plants in response to canopy addition of nitrogen treatments
Photosynthesis Marker: Amax (light-saturated Anet); Vcmax; Jmax (from A–Cc); PNUE
N addition amount: CAN: 25 and 50 kg N ha⁻¹ yr⁻¹ (CN25, CN50)
Species: Castanea henryi; Ardisia quinquegona; Blastus cochinchinensis

Author: Verryckt L. et al. (2022)
Paper Title: Vertical profiles of leaf photosynthesis and leaf traits, plus soil nutrients from tropical forests: nutrient addition experiments
N addition amount: +N = 125 kg N ha⁻¹ yr⁻¹ (urea), +P = 50 kg P ha⁻¹ yr⁻¹; 3 years

Author: Bauer GA; Bazzaz FA; Minocha R; Long S; Magill A; Aber J; Berntson GM (2004)
Paper Title: Effects of chronic N additions on tissue chemistry, photosynthetic capacity and carbon sequestration potential of a red pine stand
